title: How to Make Sweet Coffee Ice Cream

steps.headline: In a separate dish to your main, large one mix the sugar and ground coffee well.
steps.description: If it is very pale brown, add more coffee. If very dark brown, add more sugar.

steps.headline: In the same separate dish, add the ground almonds.
Pour almond-coffee mix into a blender.
Blend until most of the ice is crushed, and it is a light brown colour.
Pour into a freezable, airtight plastic carton capable of holding 2 liters (0.5 US gal) or more and place lid tightly on top.
Place plastic carton full of early ice cream in the freezer.
Eat your delicious, sweet, cold coffee ice cream!

text: Collect ingredients.  In a separate dish to your main, large one mix the sugar and ground coffee well. If it is very pale brown, add more coffee. If very dark brown, add more sugar. In the same separate dish, add the ground almonds.  Stir in the almonds.  Pour almond-coffee mix into a blender.  Add ice to blender.  Add cream to blender.  Add vanilla essence to blender.  Blend until most of the ice is crushed, and it is a light brown colour.  Pour into a freezable, airtight plastic carton capable of holding 2 liters (0.5 US gal) or more and place lid tightly on top.  Place plastic carton full of early ice cream in the freezer.  Leave for 12 - 24 hours.  Eat your delicious, sweet, cold coffee ice cream!
